subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel of Germany overtook Mark Cavendish at the line to win the 12th stage of the Tour de France. Chris Froome avoided a late crash in the main pack to preserve his lead.
snippet: Marcel Kittel of Germany overtook Mark Cavendish at the line to win the 12th stage of the Tour de France. Chris Froome avoided a late crash in the main pack to preserve his lead.
